task.title: How to add numbers
task.shortdesc: This page describes the addition of two numbers as the application MyCalculator is supposed to display upon successful operation.

taskbody.prereq: To Successfully add number you should know what is addition.
taskbody.result: The result from the addition operation is displayed.
taskbody.example: If the numbers to be added are 3 and 4 then, the equation must be 3+4=7, hence the result 7 must appear on the display.
